original_text: For all his judgments were before me: and as for his statutes, I did not depart from them.
korean_text: 그의 모든 법도를 내 앞에 두고 그의 규례를 버리지 아니하였음이로다

sentences.original_text: For all his judgments were before me
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 모든 심판이 내 앞에 있었고

sentences.original_text: I did not depart from them
